hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #9# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Compass# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mask of Truth#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Double Defense# and #Epona's Song#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Prescription#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #2# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Hover Boots#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Right Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Goron Pot's happy face# spits out #a Slingshot#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: I came here to chew bubblegum and play rando. And I'm all out of bubblegum.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Heart Container#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Water Temple#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Magic Meter# and #Saria's Song#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Prescription#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Deku Nut Capacity# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mask of Truth#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: You would be surprised at all the things you can Hookshot in the Spirit Temple!

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Tunic#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #the Song of Storms#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #the Fire Arrows# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: Have you found all 41 Gossip Stones?^Only 40 of us give hints.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Zelda's Letter#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #the Song of Storms#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Heart Container#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Tunic#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.
